name: UIImpactFeedbackGenerator
desc: A concrete UIFeedbackGenerator subclass that creates haptics to simulate physical impacts.

items.name: init(style: UIImpactFeedbackGenerator.FeedbackStyle)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized feedback generator.

items.name: enum UIImpactFeedbackGenerator.FeedbackStyle
items.desc: The mass of the objects in the collision simulated by a UIImpactFeedbackGenerator object.
